name: Gold Rush Finance
description: GOLD RUSH FINANCE is a thrilling BNB mining game set in the Wild West and built on the Binance Smart Chain Network. PLAY AND FARM In our platform, users can play our mining game to earn BNB rewards and/or yield farm in order to gain passive $GRUSH income. The game token is $GRUSH and will be launched on the Binance Smart Chain. $GRUSH token will allow players to buy Miner, Farmer, Gunmen NFT's on the GRUSH platform. NFT Gaming Assemble your crew and start mining BNB by sending your miners and gunmen NFT's to mine in several different mountains of the region. NFT Yield Farming Earn passive $GRUSH income by assigning your farmer NFT's into your GRUSH Farm
